blog.name: incorrect-marauders
blog.title: incorrect marauders quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by moony, padfoot, wormtail, and prongs. lilykins, snivellus, and minnie make some appearances.

summary:
Sirius: Peter - he was here. I can feel it.
James: What? He hasn’t been here, has he?
Sirius: Smell that?
James: Smell...
body:
Sirius: Peter - he was here. I can feel it.
James: What? He hasn’t been here, has he?
Sirius: Smell that?
James: Smell what?
Sirius: The room. It smells like Chanel No. 5 and disappointment.

dialogue.name: Sirius
dialogue.label: Sirius:
dialogue.phrase: Peter - he was here. I can feel it.

dialogue.name: James
dialogue.label: James:
dialogue.phrase: What? He hasn’t been here, has he?

dialogue.label: Sirius:

summary: Yo guys, I don't like posting hate but have you seen that annoying Harry Pooter fan? Their name is JK Rowling or some furry shit...
body: Yo guys, I don’t like posting hate but have you seen that annoying Harry Pooter fan? Their name is JK Rowling or some furry shit and they keep coming out with the most ridiculous HCs? They’re like so annoying and honestly they’re probs some white 13 year old girl who thinks lesbians are gross and that they’re the shit for liking harry potter. Like okay we get it lol you have a hobby. Cute.

blog.name: reductopromo
blog.title: ♔ 𝐑 𝐄 𝐃 𝐔 𝐂 𝐓 𝐎 ♔
blog.description:
DULCE BELLUM INEXPERTIS

War is sweet to those who have not tried it — the promise of bloodshed to the cruel, the promise of power to the despots. As it was said, they were a motley collection; a mixture of the weak seeking protection, the ambitious seeking some shared glory, and the thuggish gravitating toward a leader who could show them more refined forms of cruelty.

MAIN PAGE

summary: — DULCE BELLUM INEXPERTIS — War is sweet to those who have not tried it — the promise of bloodshed to...
caption:
— DULCE BELLUM INEXPERTIS —

War is sweet to those who have not tried it — the promise of bloodshed to the cruel, the promise of power to the despots. As it was said, they were a motley collection; a mixture of the weak seeking protection, the ambitious seeking some shared glory, and the thuggish gravitating toward a leader who could show them more refined forms of cruelty.

@reductorpg is a brand new skeleton marauders era rpg set in 1979, where our plot follows an AU that leads to a victory for the death eaters, not the order of the phoenix. our first acceptance is set for the 26th of september, come check us out!

summary: I’ve just realized the current Harry Potter fandom is a perfect example of “the death of the author” - not in that JK Rowling is...
body: I’ve just realized the current Harry Potter fandom is a perfect example of “the death of the author” - not in that JK Rowling is actually dead but that her input on the series no longer matters to the fandom which has a (more racially and lgbtqia diverse) life of it’s own now and honestly, as a philosophy nerd that’s pretty cool.

reblog.comment: I’ve just realized the current Harry Potter fandom is a perfect example of “the death of the author” - not in that JK Rowling is actually dead but that her input on the series no longer matters to the fandom which has a (more racially and lgbtqia diverse) life of it’s own now and honestly, as a philosophy nerd that’s pretty cool.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: Harry Potter hair and makeup team over the years
body:
Harry Potter hair and makeup team over the years

Philosopher’s Stone: So to achieve that signature Hermione löok we finely plaited Emma’s hair and undid it to make it look frizzy

Chamber of Secrets: She’s got a fringe and like wavy hair okay

Prisoner of Azkaban: screw the fringe, wavy hair

Goblet of Fire: same I guess, a bit lighter. Glow up for the Yule Ball

Order of the Phoenix: hair is not straight okay

Half-Blood Prince: a little bit more wavy this time

Deathly Hallows Parts 1 and 2: sometimes she ties it up but it’s not absolutely straight don’t @ us

blog.name: evilsausageflavouredpretzel
blog.title: I have no life
blog.description:
[ABOUT THE ADMIN]

Name: Charlie

Pronouns: They/them

Fandoms: Harry Potter, ASOUE, Sherlock, Thomas Sanders

Other: I’m aroace, autistic, and depressed as fuck. Also, I swear like a motherfucking sailor 😂

summary: “We’ve been betrayed. Voldemort knew you were being moved tonight and the only people who could have told him were directly...
body:
“We’ve been betrayed. Voldemort knew you were being moved tonight and the only people who could have told him were directly involved in the plan.”

You know what really gets me about this line?

Remus had already been through this.

He’d believed for nearly thirteen years that he, James, Lily, and Peter had been betrayed by Sirius. When he found out that it was actually Peter, the blow was — if anything — even worse. Because he would’ve mourned for Peter, and he would’ve wished he’d done something to stop Sirius. And then Peter was there, on the Marauders Map, and then in the Shrieking Shack, and Remus realised what had happened. He realised that he’d been mourning the betrayer, and hating the betrayed.

So when it happens for the second time, Remus comes face-to-face with those memories again. He sees James and Lily’s house destroyed, and the coldness he felt when he found out they were dead grips his heart again. He sees Sirius in the paper, a maniacal look in his eyes, the headline proclaiming his capture. He sees Peter in the Shrieking Shack, cowering on the floor, trying to get them to forgive him. He remembers how he’d wished that he’d checked whether Sirius was the one betraying them all, and how he still wishes he’d realised that Sirius couldn’t hurt the friends he called his family.

He remembers, and he doesn’t want it to happen again.

“I’m sorry, Harry, but I had to check.”

War is sweet to those who have not tried it — the promise of bloodshed to the cruel, the promise of power to the despots. As it was said, they were a motley collection; a mixture of the weak seeking protection, the ambitious seeking some shared glory, and the thuggish gravitating toward a leader who could show them more refined forms of cruelty.

@reductorpg is a brand new skeleton marauders era rpg set in 1979, where our plot follows an AU that leads to a victory for the death eaters, not the order of the phoenix. our first acceptance is set for the 26th of september, come check us out!

blog.name: drewsb12
blog.title: My Mind
blog.description: Drew // 20 // bi // always happy to talk to you so don't hesitate.

tags: harry potter and the goblet of fire
summary: 'Cause if one day you wake up and find that you're missing me And your heart starts to wonder where on this earth I could be...
caption:
‘Cause if one day you wake up and find that you’re missing me
And your heart starts to wonder where on this earth I could be
Thinking maybe you’ll come back here to the place that we’d meet
And you’ll see me waiting for you on the corner of the street.’
